adventures.title: Marshall Universities Campus
adventures.synopsis: If you're in or near Huntington WV, then this is a great place to cruise around. theres lots of food around if you get hungry and the scenery is amazing!

adventures.title: Local Trip, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
adventures.synopsis: A legendary place, the oldest mountainboard park in the world. There are two different parks in one place: a cozy home spot with jumps, rails, and quarterpipe and the full-length boardercross track on a wide slope with big air.

suggestions.title: The hills in San Francisco would be fun to bomb
suggestions.synopsis: Not being serious, these hills would be too dangerous to ride down unless you're a maniac

suggestions.title: South Mountain Summit Road is goated
suggestions.synopsis: Best place I could suggest is the South Mountain Summit Road, its got a perfect grade and the turns aren't too sharp .

messages.message: What is the best brand of longboard?
Do I really need to wear a helmet and pads? I feel like a dork wearing them
